title: rAjan mahArAjan
sahitya:
rAjan mahArAjan tiruvoTriyUr mEvum tiruvALan tyAga


anupallavi

  tEjasvarUpan divya mangaLadharan shrI vaDivuDaiyAL sEvittu magizhndiDum


caraNam    maTTillA pugazh mighum paTTinattAr anru kaTTik-kalanda karuNai arashE
taTTik-kazhikkAmal tanaiyanai AtkoNDu paTTinippiNi muppu paTrAdenrE ALum
